title: At Least 15 Die in Rare Collision Between Migrant Boat and Greek Patrol Vessel
summary_full: Deadly shipwrecks often occur in the Aegean Sea, which is one of the main maritime routes to Europe, but they generally involve migrant boats sinking in stormy weather.
summary_public: Deadly shipwrecks often occur in the Aegean Sea, which is one of the main maritime routes to Europe, but they generally involve migrant boats sinking in stormy weather.

GR.label: negative
